message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. With its exceptional features and quality, it's truly a remarkable investment. I believe in its value and am confident it will serve you well. Considering its worth, I propose a special introductory price of $150 for you. This is an exclusive opportunity to own this product at a slightly higher value than what most others might pay, reflecting its unique benefits and your early adoption. Please let me know if you're interested in exploring this offer further.
